title: Bite Club
description:
Bite Club is a Vertigo comic book series created by writers Howard Chaykin and David Tischman and drawn by artist David Hahn.  It is essentially a crime story in which all of the protagonists are vampires living in Miami.  Chaykin has said the comic was a metaphor for racial profiling and the immigrant experience.

In the first mini-series after the murder of vampire crime boss Eduardo del Toro, his heirs and relatives fight for control of his organization.

The follow-up, Bite Club: Vampire Crime Unit see's Miami's Vampire Crime Unit investigates the murder of a drug-addicted stripper with the new leader of the del Toro crime family as the prime suspect.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
